text: José Augusto Brandão (April 21, 1911Brandão's worldfootball.net profile lists his date of birth as September 19, 1916, but this seems unlikely given the years of his career, and all other sources list the 1911 birth year - July 20, 1989)CBF profiel was a Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Footballers from São Paulo (state)
title: José Augusto Brandão
